name: Super Doctor Adventure
description:
A cute platformer game 

Help the doctor to defeat viruses reach hospitals to save the world

defeat bosses , discover worlds and hidden worlds 

use powerups on your way 

developed by : Mohamed Said 

for Tafra Jam 2021 

Game assets :

- Some drawn and edited by the developer

- Other are free  to use assets from OpenGameArt.org

and PNGWing - Exclusive png design images

totally copyright free and edited by the developer

hope you like it ❤

Have Fun and Happy eid to all
